wikipedia_page.main: John "Johnny" Walsh (born  (1946-06-13) 13 June 1946), also known by the nickname of "Waller", is an English World Cup former winning professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and England, and at club level for St. Helens (Heritage № 852), as a fullback, wing, centre, or stand-off, i.e. number 1, 2 or 5, 3 or 4, or 6.
